register.heading: Register to Witch
register.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Login here
register.usernameDescription: This is how other users will see you.
register.emailDescription: We may use your email to send you important account related messages.
register.passwordDescription: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
register.successAlertDescription: A confirmation email has been sent to your email address. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.

login.heading: Login to Witch
login.loginDescription: Your username or email you used during registration.
login.pinDescription: Enter the code from your authenticator app.

resetPassword.heading: Password reset
resetPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Login here
resetPassword.successAlertDescription: We have sent a password reset link to your email. If you have Telegram notification enabled, it was also sent there.
resetPassword.errorMessage: Unexpected error occurred during password reset

newPassword.heading: New password
newPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Login here
newPassword.passwordDescription: Create a new password. Password must be at least 8 characters long.
newPassword.errorMessage: Unexpected error occurred during password reset

deactivate.heading: Deactivate Account
deactivate.emailDescription: Your email you used during registration.
deactivate.pinDescription: A 6-digit code has been sent to your email. If you have enabled Telegram notifications, the code has also been sent there.
deactivate.successMessage: You have successfully deactivated your account
deactivate.errorMessage: Unexpected error occurred while deactivating your account

header.heading: Settings
header.description: You can change your account settings here

header.heading: Profile
header.description: Customize your profile, update your avatar, change your personal information and add links to social networks to make your profile more attractive to other users.

avatar.heading: Your profile picture

confirmModal.heading: Remove avatar
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to remove your profile picture? This action cannot be undone.

avatar.info: Supported formats: JPG, JPEG, PNG, WEBP or GIF. Max size: 10 MB
avatar.successfullUpdate: Your avatar has been successfully updated!
avatar.successfullRemove: Your avatar has been successfully removed!
avatar.errorUpdating: Unexpected error occurred while updating your avatar. Please try again.
avatar.errorRemoving: Unexpected error occurred while removing your avatar. Please try again.

info.heading: Profile Settings
info.usernameDescription: This is how other users will see you.
info.displayNameDescription: Your name that other users will see.
info.bioDescription: Teel us about yourself. Your bio cannot be longer than 300 characters.
info.errorMessage: Unexpected error occurred while updating your profile. Please try again.

createForm.heading: Social Media Links
createForm.titleDescription: Text of the social media link.
createForm.urlDescription: Where does this link lead? Enter the full URL, e.g. https://teastream.ru/
createForm.errorMessage: Unexpected error occurred while adding a social link. Please try again.

editForm.errorUpdateMessage: Unexpected error occurred while updating a social link. Please try again.
editForm.errorRemoveMessage: Unexpected error occurred while removing a social link. Please try again.

socialLinks.errorReorderMessage: Unexpected error occurred while updating social links order. Please try again.

header.heading: Account
header.description: Manage your account settings, including changing access, security, and the ability to deactivate.
header.securityDescription: Set up two-factor authentication for enhanced data protection.
header.deactivationDescription: If you want to temporarily or permanently disable your account, use this option. Please note the consequences.

email.heading: Email
email.emailDescription: Enter your new email address. Make sure it is valid, as a confirmation email will be sent to it.
email.errorMessage: Unexpected error occurred while updating your email. Please try again.

password.heading: Account password
password.oldPasswordDescription: Enter your old password to confirm your identity before changing the password. This is necessary to ensure the security of your account.
password.newPasswordDescription: Your new password must be at least 8 characters long. It is recommended to use special characters to increase the reliability of the password.
password.errorMessage: Unexpected error occurred while updating your password. Please try again.

twoFactor.heading: TOTP Authentication
twoFactor.description: Increase the security of your account by enabling TOTP authentication. This additional layer of protection requires entering a unique code, which makes your account less vulnerable to unauthorized access.

enable.heading: Enable TOTP
enable.qrInstructions: Scan the QR code to add TOTP
enable.pinDescription: Please enter the 6-digit code that you can get in the authentication app.
enable.errorMessage: Unexpected error occurred while enabling TOTP authentication. Please try again.

disable.heading: Are you sure you want to disable TOTP?
disable.message: Disabling TOTP authentication will make your account less secure. Are you sure you want to continue?
disable.errorMessage: Unexpected error occurred while disabling TOTP authentication. Please try again.

deactivation.heading: Deactivate account
deactivation.description: After deactivating your account, you will not be able to log in. After 7 days, the account will be completely deleted. Until then, you can contact support to restore access and unlock your account.

confirmModal.heading: Confirm Deactivation
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account? Access can only be restored within 7 days.

header.heading: Appearance
header.description: Customize the look and feel of the site interface to your liking. Choose the theme and language that will make your experience more comfortable.

theme.heading: Theme preferences
theme.description: Choose how Witch looks to you. Select either dark or light theme. Selections are applied immediately and saved automatically.
theme.errorMessage: Unexpected error occurred while changing the theme. Please try again.

language.heading: Language preferences
language.description: Choose the language in which you want to see the site interface. Selections are applied immediately and saved automatically.
language.successMessage: Language preferences have been successfully changed!

colors.heading: Color preferences
colors.description: Choose the color scheme of the site interface. Selections are applied immediately and saved automatically.

header.heading: Notifications
header.description: Configure how you want to receive notifications from Witch. You will receive notifications about the start of broadcasts on the channels you are subscribed to, as well as about new subscribers.

siteNotifications.heading: Site notifications
siteNotifications.description: If you turn off site notifications, you will not receive notifications about the start of broadcasts on the channels you are subscribed to, as well as about new subscribers.

telegramNotifications.heading: Telegram notifications
telegramNotifications.description: If you enable Telegram notifications, your Witch account will be linked to your Telegram account, and you will receive messages about the start of broadcasts on the channels you are subscribed to, about new subscribers, password resets, and confirmation codes.

notifications.errorMessage: Unexpected error occurred while changing notification settings. Please try again.

header.heading: Sessions
header.description: Sessions are the devices you use or have used to log into your Whitch account. Active sessions are shown here.

confirmModal.heading: Delete session
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete this session? This action will permanently delete the session on this device and terminate all active actions associated with it.

sessionsItem.errorMessage: Unexpected error occurred while deleting session. Please try again.

header.heading: Stream keys
header.description: Generate a URL and key for live streaming.

url.heading: URL
url.placeholder: Your server URL will be displayed here

key.heading: Stream key
key.placeholder: Stream key will be displayed here

instructionsModal.heading: üõ†Ô∏è OBS setup instructions for live streaming
instructionsModal.description: To start sharing your content with the audience, follow the detailed instructions on connecting OBS Studio. Just a few steps and you're ready to go live!
instructionsModal.step1Title: üîë Step 1: Download OBS Studio and generate Server URL and Stream Key
instructionsModal.step1Description: To start broadcasting, you need to get two important elements: Server URL and Stream Key. Follow these steps:
instructionsModal.downloadObsDescription: Before you start broadcasting, download and install the program
instructionsModal.copyKeys: Copy Server URL and Stream Key
instructionsModal.copyKeysDescription: After generation, two fields will appear on the screen: Server URL and Stream Key. Copy the data.
instructionsModal.step2Description: Now that you have the necessary data, let's set up OBS Studio to work with your broadcast:
instructionsModal.openObsDescription: If you do not have OBS Studio installed, download and install the program from the official website. After starting, the main page of OBS Studio will open.
instructionsModal.openStreamSettingsDescription: In the top menu, click "File" ‚Üí "Settings". Go to the "Stream" tab
instructionsModal.enterDetailsDescription: In the "Service" field, select the "Custom..." option. Paste the previously copied Server URL into the "URL" field. In the "Stream Key" field, paste your Stream Key.
instructionsModal.saveSettingsDescription: Click "Apply", and then "OK" to save the changes.
instructionsModal.step3Description: After successfully setting up OBS Studio, you are ready to start live streaming:
instructionsModal.startStreamDescription: Return to the main OBS Studio screen and click the "Start Streaming" button.
instructionsModal.monitorStreamDescription: Your stream will start in real-time mode, and you will be able to watch it on the platform as well as in OBS Studio.
instructionsModal.congrats: ‚ú® Congratulations! You have now successfully set up OBS Studio for broadcasting on our platform. Your audience is waiting for new bright moments!

createModal.heading: Generate keys
createModal.ingressTypeDescription: Select RTMP for classic broadcasting or WHIP for WebRTC connections.
createModal.errorMessage: Unexpected error occurred while creating ingress. Please try again.

header.heading: Chat Settings
header.description: Here you can manage your chat settings.

isChatEnabled.heading: Enable chat
isChatEnabled.description: If you enable chat, viewers of your live stream will be able to write messages in the chat.

isChatFollowersOnly.heading: Followers only chat
isChatFollowersOnly.description: If you enable this setting, only your followers will be able to write in the chat during the live stream

isChatPremiumFollowersOnly.heading: Sponsors only chat
isChatPremiumFollowersOnly.description: If you enable this setting, only your sponsors will be able to write in the chat during the live stream

chat.errorMessage: Unexpected error occurred while changing chat settings. Please try again.

header.heading: Followers
header.description: Keep track of your followers, here you can see the list of all your followers.

header.heading: Sponsors
header.description: Keep track of your sponors, here you can see the list of all your sponors.

header.heading: Premium plans
header.description: Here you can see the list of premium plans for your channel.

alert.heading: Channel verification required
alert.description: To create premium plans, your channel must be verified. To verify your channel, you need to have 1000 one-time subscribers.

createForm.heading: Create plan
createForm.titleDescription: Enter the name of your plan. This name will be displayed to your channel subscribers.
createForm.descriptionDescription: Describe what your plan includes. This will help subscribers understand the benefits of subscribing.
createForm.priceDescription: Specify the price of your plan. This is the amount that premium subscribers will pay for the subscription.
createForm.errorMessage: Unexpected error occurred while creating a premium plan. Please try again.

header.heading: Transactions
header.description: Here you can see all transactions related to channel sponsorship.
